turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good afternoon, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'll I'll take I want to like to order some new some pizzas from the new pizzeria in Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's do it. what did you want to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, first of all, I'll get two medium pizzas. The first one is going to be a Hawaiian pizza with extra mushrooms and extra pineapple on gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it and for the second one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We're going to get a meat lover's medium with gluten free crust, and we're going to slap some extra mushrooms, jalapeños, and extra sauce on that bad boy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. You said you'd like 2 medium pizzas, 1 Hawaiian with extra mushrooms and pineapples on gluten free crust, 1 meat lovers with gluten free crust extra mushrooms, jalapenos, and extra sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct. Both on gluten-free crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I sure would. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the order has been submitted. It'll be ready for pick up in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's going to be all. Thank you so much for the wonderful experience.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome. Enjoy those interesting sounding pizzas.
